item.title: [Interview] B.O.B. International Magazine of Space Design
item.description: Click here to download this interview PDF document. Kim Sowon : Could you please introduce yourself to our readers? VJ Fader : My Korean name is Choi Moonbong, my artist name is VJ Fader, my friends call me James. My family background is Korean Chinese. Last time when I visited South Korea was in 2011 for an artist residency called Gachang in the country side of Daegu. I have been living and studying in Los Angeles since I was a teenager.
